title: Make Me Laugh
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: What makes you laugh? How do you feel when you laugh? In Make Me Laugh, students get to see different things that make a little girl laugh. Colorful illustrations, simple sentences, and repetitive phrasing provide support for early emergent readers. This story can also be used to teach students how to determine cause and effect and the proper use of nouns.
reviewWords: clowns, comics, friends, laugh, pets, tickles
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Final Consonants : Discriminate final consonant /s/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word make
